languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, я вынуждена отказаться. Я обещаю, что, как только пойму, что мое время пришло, вы перв{mf|ый|ая} об этом узнаете. Вы успеете вышвырнуть меня в шлюз или мозги мне продырявить, и я не буду сопротивляться. Но лучше я здесь и сейчас сдохну, чем стану... как этот".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, я вынуждена отказаться. Я обещаю, что как только пойму, что мое время пришло, вы перв{mf|ый|ая} об этом узнаете. Вы успеете вышвырнуть меня в шлюз или мозги мне продырявить, и я не буду сопротивляться. Но лучше я здесь и сейчас сдохну, чем стану как этот".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I must refuse. I promise, as soon as I realise my time has come, you'll be the first to know. I'll give you enough time to throw me out the airlock or blast a hole in my brain — I won't put up a fight. But I'd rather drop dead here and now than become... like this poor sod."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, я вынуждена отказаться. Я обещаю, что, как только пойму, что мое время пришло, вы перв{mf|ый|ая} об этом узнаете. Вы успеете вышвырнуть меня в шлюз или мозги мне продырявить, и я не буду сопротивляться. Но лучше я здесь и сейчас сдохну, чем стану... как этот".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I must refuse. I promise, as soon as I realise my time has come, you'll be the first to know. I'll give you enough time to throw me out the airlock or put a hole in my brain, I won't resist. But I'd rather drop dead here and now than become... like this one here."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I must refuse. I promise, as soon as I realise my time has come, you'll be the first to know. I'll give you enough time to throw me out the airlock or put a hole in my brain, I won't resist. But I'd rather drop dead here and now than become... like this one here."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I must refuse. I promise, as soon as I realise my time has come, you'll be the first to know. I'll give you enough time to throw me out the airlock or blast a hole in my brain — I won't put up a fight. But I'd rather drop dead here and now than become... like this poor sod."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I must refuse. I promise, as soon as I realise my time has come, you'll be the first to know. I'll give you enough time to throw me out the airlock or blast a hole in my brain — I won't put up a fight. But I'd rather drop dead here and now than become... like this poor sod."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I must refuse. I promise, as soon as I realise my time has come, you'll be the first to know. I'll give you enough time to throw me out the airlock or blast a hole in my brain — I won't put up a fight. But I'd rather drop dead here and now than become... like this poor sod."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，我必须拒绝。我可以保证，当我感觉到自己大限将至，我会第一个告诉你。我会给你给你足够的时间把我丢出气闸，或者在我脑子上开个洞，我是不会反抗的。不过，我宁可现在就死在这里，也不想变成……这个可怜的家伙。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I must refuse. I promise, as soon as I realise my time has come, you'll be the first to know. I'll give you enough time to throw me out the airlock or blast a hole in my brain — I won't put up a fight. But I'd rather drop dead here and now than become... like this poor sod."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我必须拒绝。我可以保证，当我感觉到自己大限将至，我会第一个告诉你。我会给你给你足够的时间把我丢出气闸，或者在我脑子上开个洞，我是不会反抗的。不过，我宁可现在就死在这里，也不想变成……这个可怜的家伙。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, debo negarme. Prometo que, en cuanto comprenda que me ha llegado la hora, será {mf|el primero|la primera} en saberlo. Le daré tiempo suficiente para tirarme por una esclusa o abrirme la cabeza; no me resistiré. Pero prefiero morir aquí y ahora que acabar... como este pobre desgraciado».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I must refuse. I promise, as soon as I realise my time has come, you'll be the first to know. I'll give you enough time to throw me out the airlock or blast a hole in my brain — I won't put up a fight. But I'd rather drop dead here and now than become... like this poor sod."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, debo negarme. Prometo que, en cuanto comprenda que me ha llegado la hora, será {mf|el primero|la primera} en saberlo. Le daré tiempo suficiente para tirarme por una esclusa o abrirme la cabeza; no me resistiré. Pero prefiero morir aquí y ahora que acabar... como este pobre desgraciado».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich muss ablehnen. Ich verspreche, sobald ich merke, dass meine Zeit gekommen ist, erfahrt Ihr es als {mf|Erster|Erste}. Ich gebe Euch genug Zeit, um mich aus der Luftschleuse zu werfen oder mir ein Loch ins Hirn zu pusten — ich wehre mich nicht. Aber ich würde lieber hier und jetzt tot umfallen, als ... wie dieser arme Wurm zu werden."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I must refuse. I promise, as soon as I realise my time has come, you'll be the first to know. I'll give you enough time to throw me out the airlock or blast a hole in my brain — I won't put up a fight. But I'd rather drop dead here and now than become... like this poor sod."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich muss ablehnen. Ich verspreche, sobald ich merke, dass meine Zeit gekommen ist, erfahrt Ihr es als {mf|Erster|Erste}. Ich gebe Euch genug Zeit, um mich aus der Luftschleuse zu werfen oder mir ein Loch ins Hirn zu pusten — ich wehre mich nicht. Aber ich würde lieber hier und jetzt tot umfallen, als ... wie dieser arme Wurm zu werden."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「拒否するわ、ロード・キャプテン。自分がいよいよダメだと悟ったら、すぐに知らせるって約束する。その後はあたいをエアロックから放り出だすか、脳天に風穴を開けるための十分な時間だってあげるわ。抵抗もしない。でも、こんな哀れな存在になるくらいなら…今ここで死んだ方がマシよ」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I must refuse. I promise, as soon as I realise my time has come, you'll be the first to know. I'll give you enough time to throw me out the airlock or blast a hole in my brain — I won't put up a fight. But I'd rather drop dead here and now than become... like this poor sod."

traits.locale_text: 「拒否するわ、ロード・キャプテン。自分がいよいよダメだと悟ったら、すぐに知らせるって約束する。その後はあたいをエアロックから放り出だすか、脳天に風穴を開けるための十分な時間だってあげるわ。抵抗もしない。でも、こんな哀れな存在になるくらいなら…今ここで死んだ方がマシよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis au regret de devoir refuser, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous promets cependant que vous serez {mf|le premier informé|la première informée} quand mon heure sera venue. Vous aurez tout le temps de m'éjecter par un sas ou de me tirer une balle dans la tête, je ne me défendrai pas. Mais je préfère mourir tout de suite plutôt que devenir comme... ce pauvre type. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I must refuse. I promise, as soon as I realise my time has come, you'll be the first to know. I'll give you enough time to throw me out the airlock or blast a hole in my brain — I won't put up a fight. But I'd rather drop dead here and now than become... like this poor sod."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis au regret de devoir refuser, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous promets cependant que vous serez {mf|le premier informé|la première informée} quand mon heure sera venue. Vous aurez tout le temps de m'éjecter par un sas ou de me tirer une balle dans la tête, je ne me défendrai pas. Mais je préfère mourir tout de suite plutôt que devenir comme... ce pauvre type. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Reddetmek zorundayım Lord Kaptan. Söz, zamanımın geldiğini fark ettiğimde ilk sana söyleyeceğim. Beni hava kilidinden dışarı atacak ya da kafama sıkacak kadar vakit tanıyacağım. Karşı koymayacağım. Fakat bu zavallıya dönüşmektense burada ölmeyi yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I must refuse. I promise, as soon as I realise my time has come, you'll be the first to know. I'll give you enough time to throw me out the airlock or blast a hole in my brain — I won't put up a fight. But I'd rather drop dead here and now than become... like this poor sod."

traits.locale_text: "Reddetmek zorundayım Lord Kaptan. Zamanımın geldiğini fark ettiğimde ilk sana söyleyeceğime söz veriyorum. Beni hava deliğinden dışarı atacak ya da kafama sıkacak kadar vakit tanıyacağım. Karşı koymayacağım. Fakat bu zavallıya dönüşmektense burada ölmeyi yeğlerim."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
